exposurecontrol: Programmed auto exposure with flexible program aperture-priority auto shutter priority auto
sensitivity: ISO 100-3200 Can be expanded to 6400 Hi 0.3 (ISO 8,000 equivalent) Hi 0.7 (ISO 10,000 equivalent) Hi 1 (ISO 12,800 equivalent) Hi 2 (ISO 25,600 equivalent)
exposurecompensation: -5 EV to +5 EV in increments of 1/3 EV
selftimer: Can be selected from 20, 10, 5 and 2 second durations
flashcontrol: TTL auto flash with monitor preflashes Manual flash control available Guide Number approx. 6/21, or 6/22 when fired in manual mode at full power (ISO 100, m/ft, 23 degreeC/73.4 degreeF)
focallength: 18.5mm (angle of view equivalent to that of 28 mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
externalflash: ISO 518 hot-shoe contact with sync and data contacts and safety lock
scenemodes: Autumn colors Beach/Snow Blossom Candlelight Children Close Up Dusk/Dawn Food Landscape Night Landscape Night Portrait Party/Indoor Pet Portrait Portrait Silhouette Sports Sunset High Key Low Key
shutterspeed: 1/2000 - 30 s; bulb and time available in mode M (time requires optional ML-L3 remote control)
fileformats: JPEG, RAW (NEF; a proprietary Nikon format)
